thread.section_title: Booking.com Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Booking.com | www.booking.com
thread.title: Craig matthews

author: Craig matthews
title: Craig matthews
text: Booked a hotel with these for my stay in San Francisco over a year ago and found out that it is now under renovation. After reading the reviews on Trip advisor i couldn't stay there. As my booking was over a year ago it was a non-refundable booking. Booking.com contacted the hotel for me explained my situation and managed to sort out a free cancellation for me.
